document_data.caption: The [[House of the Morning]] in [[Eveningstar]], with the mouth of [[Eveningstar Gorge]] in the Stonecliff in the distance.
document_data.name: Stonecliff
document_data.mainbody: The '''Stonecliff''' was a perilous, rocky, craggy limestone escarpment that formed a natural wall along the north side of The [[High Road]].<ref name=VGtC-p142 /> The [[Eveningstar Gorge]], or Starwater Gorge, along the [[Starwater River]] was the only route that [[mount]]s and livestock could take through the Stonecliff.<ref name=VGtC-p173>
document_data.Rumors: It is said that once many [[mage]]s dwelt in caves in or north of the Stonecliff.<ref name=VGtC-p144>
